title: Allok Video Splitter 1.4.6
description: Allok Video Splitter is a powerful tool to split, cut or trim a large AVI, Divx, MPEG, VOB, DAT, ASF/WMV file into smaller clips in various format. The included video player and different splitting mode let you split or cut a movie file to smaller clips easily.You can extract multiple segments of any size or multiple pieces of equal size automatically. You can even use it to convert a single file. Output format include AVI, MPEG I/II, VCD, SVCD, DVD, WMV/ASF. Support different AVI video Codecs, such as DivX, Xvid, MPEG4; NTSC/PAL setting options for DVD, VCD, SVCD exporting; Change the framerate, image size etc as you like. The interface is very user-firenldy and easy-to-use. Very quick in conversion speed and no quality is lost!
